key.name: dark
key.description: Whether to use the dark version of the UI theme

key.name: font-source
key.summary: How to choose the main font

key.name: font
key.description: Description of font to use in editor windows

key.name: columns
key.description: Number of text columns for new windows

key.name: lines
key.description: Number of text lines for new windows

key.name: maximise
key.description: Whether to open new windows maximised (overrides columns and rows)

key.name: init-file
key.description: Pathname of an alternative init.vim file (blank for default)

key.name: cursor-width
key.description: Width of the beam cursor used in insert mode, in pixels

key.name: cursor-bg
key.description: The cursor's main/background colour in #rrggbb or rgb(r,g,b) notation etc or blank for default (inverse of default background colour)

key.name: cursor-fg
key.description: Foreground colour of text under the cursor in #rrggbb or rgb(r,g,b) notation etc or blank for default (inverse of default text colour)

key.name: sync-shada
key.summary: Sync shared data on focus changes
key.description: If true, the UI will request that nvim instances save the shada file (formerly known as viminfo) when they lose focus and load it when they gain focus
